channel.description: Recent content in Reverse Engineering on Romain Thomas

item.title: A Glimpse Into DexProtector
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post provides a high-level overview of DexProtector’s security features and their limitations

item.title: Open-Obfuscator
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: A free and open-source obfuscator for mobile applications

item.title: Part 2 – iOS Native Code Obfuscation and Syscall Hooking
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This second blog post deals with native code obfuscation and RASP syscall interception

item.title: Part 1 – SingPass RASP Analysis
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This first blog post introduces the RASP checks used in SingPass

item.title: A Journey in iOS App Obfuscation
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This series of blog posts details how obfuscators can protect iOS applications from reverse engineering

item.title: PGSharp: Analysis of a Cheating App for PokemonGO
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post is about the internal mechanisms of PGSharp, a cheat engine for PokemonGO.

item.title: Gotta Catch 'Em All: Frida & jailbreak detection
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This blog post analyzes the Frida and Jailbreak detection in PokemonGO for iOS.

item.title: r2-pay: whitebox (part 2)
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This second blog post explains how to recover the whitebox’s key from the obfuscated library libnative-lib.so

item.title: r2-pay: anti-debug, anti-root & anti-frida (part 1)
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: This first blog post describes the protections in the challenge r2-pay.

item.title: A Glimpse Into Tencent's Legu Packer
item.author: me@romainthomas.fr (Romain Thomas)
item.description: Analysis of Tencent Legu: a packer for Android applications.
